name: Golvellius - The Valley of Doom
description:
Golvellius: The Valley of Doom, is adapted and published on the iPhone by DotEmu, licensed by D4Entreprise,Inc.

Thank you everyone for supporting Golvellius! Do not forget to rate us 5 stars after every update and we'll keep on going with new content! Feel free to tell the world about this game!
